TRinity::

"YEAHHHHH!!!!" and followed Grounded

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Grounded/Lynxiz::
> Grounded looked to Trinity then Nightlight. She knew how to deal 
with
> the young bot.
> "Come on Trin...i need some major help up here.
> 
> Lynxiz looked to Nightlight then looked to thier enemy's.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Trinity:::
> >
> > "I'm not a guard... "whined Trinity "I'm a warrior... I have to
> > protect my base "
> >

to

stop
> > them???"
> >

> > > In an instant Grounded disabled Trinity's code not allowing her 
to

> > >

> > > "Sorry but you took me in....I shall fight for you...for now." 
she

> > having a

> > second.
> > > "Get out" the small mole spit out and Lynxiz ran out not 
waiting the

jojn
> > this

> > > > against Deemos.

> > > > the exit
